State of Kentucky
McLean County } Sct

I Douglas Little Presiding Judge for McLean county ^Kentucky^ do certify thatCharles W. Hanway ^Personally^ appeared before me and took the following Oath, To Wit: I Charles W. Hanway do solemnly Swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United States And the constitution of Kentucky and will discharge all and singular the duties and services appertaining to the office of First Lieutenant in the Volunteer Militia agreeably the Law and General regulations and will attend promt obey such orders and instructions as I shall receive from time to time receive from the proper officer which is hereby certified to general head quarters
Given Under my hand at Calhoon Ky 23rd November 1861

Douglas Little
P. J McLean County
